description:
Everything you need to keep your butane powered Thermacell repeller going for 120 hours of mosquito protection.

  • Provides 5m dome of protection in 10–30 minutes
  • Each mat lasts for up to 4 hours and goes from blue to white once empty, making it easy to know when to change the mat
  • Butane canisters lasts for up 12 hours
  • Kit includes 10 butane canisters and 30 mats
name: Thermacell Value Pack Refill 120 Hours
